CustomField.formula: IF ( Account.Primary_Contact__c = Id ,IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0685J0000009Fmv&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5J000000SQYP", "P",23,14), "") + IF ( Account.SF_BillTo_Contact__c = Id , IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0685J0000009Fmr&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5J000000SQYK", "B",23,14), "") + IF ( Account.SF_SoldTo_Contact__c = Id , IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0685J0000009Fn0&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5J000000SQYZ", "S",23,14), "") + IF ( Ambassador_ID__c != NULL, IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0685J0000009Fmq&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5J000000SQYF", "A",23,14), "")
CustomField.label: Roles
